posts.text: 通过 set 去统计list 中不同元素的个数 Database entity: It is a thing, person, place, unit, object or any item about which the data should be captured and stored in the form of properties, workflow and tables. While workflow and tables are optional for database entity, properties are required (because entity without properties is not an entity) Data linkage: It is a method of bringing information from different sources together about the same person or entity to create a new, richer dataset. - Data LinkageLearning objectives Data Linkage: is a method of bringing information from different sources together about the same person or entity to create a new, richer dataset. • Learn how to use JDBC/cx_Oracle to interact with Oracle DBMS, including create table, update table, query table, etc. (optional) JDBC: Java Database Connectivity(JDBC) is an application programming interface (API) for the programming language Java, which defines how a client may access a database. It is a Java-based data access technology used for Java database connectivity. It is part of the Java Standard Edition platform, from Oracle Corporation. Oracle DBMS• Learn how to measure the performance of data linkage. • Understand various string similarity measures, e.g., edit distance and Jaccard coefficient, for field-level data linkage. • Understand the weighted-sum strategy for record-level data linkage. • Understand the blocking technique used for improving the efficiency of data linkage.Part 2: Measure the Performance of Data Linkagea1. Nested Loop Join for Data Linkage2. Precision, Recall, and F-measure Data Linkage: 可以被看作是一个分类问题，例如数据 r 和 s， 我们预测结果设置为 0 和 1. 当结果为 1 则意味着数据 r 和 s 指向的是同一个实体，因此可以被链接。 正确的数据链接算法必须满足以下条件：1) all the linked pairs it predicts are correct2) it can output all possible linked pairs. 在这个Task中 D 代表算法链接的结果，D代表正确的链接结果• True positive, if it belongs to both D and D • False positive, if it only belongs to D • False negative, if it only belongs to D* • True negative, if it belongs to neither D nor D* 因此我们可以通过以下公式计算 precision 和 recall 𝑃𝑟𝑒𝑐𝑖𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛 = tp / 𝑡𝑝+𝑓𝑝 ：理解为精度 𝑅𝑒𝑐𝑎𝑙𝑙 = tp / 𝑡𝑝+𝑓𝑛 ：理解为召回以切除肿瘤为例：更高的精确度降低了误切除健康细胞的机会(阳性结果)但也降低了清除所有癌细胞的机会(阴性结果)。 ‘’’解释两者关系，并引出 F-measureOften, there is an inverse relationship between precision and recall, where it is possible to increase one at the cost of reducing the other. Brain surgery provides an illustrative example of the trade-off. Consider a brain surgeon tasked with removing a cancerous tumour from a patient’s brain. The surgeon needs to remove all of the tumour cells since any remaining cancer cells will regenerate the tumour. Conversely, the surgeon must not remove healthy brain cells since thatwould leave the patient with impaired brain function. The surgeon may be more liberal in the area of the brain she removes to ensure she has extracted all the cancer cells. This decision increases recall but reduces precision. On the other hand, the surgeon may be more conservative in the brain she removes to ensure she extracts only cancer cells. This decision increases precision but reduces recall. That is to say, greater recall increases the chances of removing healthy cells (negative outcome) and increases the chances of removing all cancer cells (positive outcome). Greater precision decreases the chances of removing healthy cells (positive outcome)but also decreases the chances of removing all cancer cells (negative outcome). Therefore,another performance measure, F-measure, was proposed to combine precision and recall by their harmonic mean, as shown below.‘’’F = 2 (precision recall) / (precision + recall) 疑问F为什么可以结合两者的特点-调和平均数‘’’ ####Task2————-Answer:————————–eg. “The false positive is the records that appear in both the linkage result and the gold-standard, which is corresponding to count/r esult.size(). There are 120 false positive pairs.”\ 1) The true positive is the records that appear in both the linkage result and gold-standard, which is corresponding tocount. There are 75 true positive pairs. 2) The false positive and true positive are the records that appear in the linkage result, which corresponding to the len(results). There are 82 false positives and true positive pairs. 3) The true positive and false negative are the records that appear in gold-stand, which corresponding to the len(benchmark). There are 106 true positive and false negative pairs. In this case, precision means the proportion of the pairs that appear in both the results and benchmark in resluts.(语法需要检查recall还没有写) Part 3: Similarity Measures for Field-Level Data Linkage由于在大多数情况下，数据库中的数据是存在错误的拼写、不规范的数据等问题，所以我们需要通过计算记录之间的相似度去链接数据。这次作业主要用了两种方法 Jaccard Coefficient(Jaccard index / Intersection over Union) J(A,B) = |A∩B| / |A∪B| = |{0,2,5}| /|{0,1,2,3, 4,5,6,7,9}| = 3/9 = 0.33.• A = {0,1,2,5,6}• B = {0,2,3,4,5,7,9} 在这里因为我们要对字符串操作涉及到了顺序问题，所以可以采用 q-gram 的方法，例如 3-gram 下 “python” 这个单词会被划分为： pyt yth tho hon 四个 Task 4 Edit Distancehttps://www.jianshu.com/p/a617d20162cf编辑距离是指针对两个字符串 A 和 B，将A转化为B 所需要的最小编辑操作数，其中包括三种编辑操作：• Insert a character into a string;• Delete a character from a string;• Replace a character of a string by another character.在实际操作中不同的编辑是具有不同权重的，在这次实验中对此并无要求，所有权重都视为相同的权重 Data Pre-processing Assignment————— Q1 - Start ——————- Question - 11.1 -What’s mean of Intergrity constraints? Intergrity constraints are a set of rules. It is used to maintain the quality of information. Integrity constraints ensure that the data insertion, updating, and other processes have be performed in such a way that data Integrity is nor effect 完整性约束是指 一系列的规则。 他是被用来保证数据质量。 完整性约束确保数据的插入、更新以及其他操作不会影响数据的完整性。1.2 -What the intergity constraints should primary key follow? 1. No two rows of a table have duplicate values in the specified colun or set of columns. 不重复 2. The primary key do not allow nulls. 不为空 1.3 What’s mean of schema? 1.3 Answer: (1) -The ‘id’ should be the primary key for Book1. - -No duplicate values and No nulls. (2) - Book 3 - SELECT TOP 100 Title, SalesRank from Book3 ORDER BY SalesRank ————— Q1 - End ——————— ————— Q2 - Start ——————-2.1 -Fragmentation strategy http://www.comp.hkbu.edu.hk/~wschow/dd/ch2.html Fragmentation is the task of dividing a table into a set of smaller tables. The subsets of the table are called fragments. Fragmentation can be of three types: horizontal, vertical, and hybrid (combination of horizontal and vertical). Fragmentation 就是将一个表分割成几个更小的表，分割得到的表叫做 fragments。 Fragmentation 有三种类型：水平、垂直、混合 Oracle 数据库导入CSV文件时 数据类型转换以及空值的问题————— Q2 - End ——————— ————— Q3 - Start ——————-Lecture 5————— Q3 - End ——————— ————— Q4 - Start ——————-Lecture 6————— Q4 - End ——————— ————— Q5 - Start ——————- ————— Q5 - End ——————— ————— Q6 - Start ——————- ————— Q6 - End ——————— ————— Q7 - Start ——————-（1） a. “Richmond Shee, Kirtikumar Deshpande and K. Gopalakrishnan;” b. “K. Gopalakrishnan, Kirtikumar Deshpande, and Richmond Shee” For these two lists, the content is the same but the order is different. Thus, Jaccard distance is more likely to regard them as similar. Because Jaccard method will split the sting to a set. In this way, the distance between a and b is small.In the contrast, edit distance calculate the distance by the number of steps which include insert,delete,replace. posts.text: ##Essay Format The marks for the sections provide a guide for how long the sections should be. While it is not enforced, having section headings which align to the criterion makes sense (you can add further sub headings as you wish). Clear introduction of the discussed topic - 400 words Discussion of the distributed computing paradigm and/or architecture - 600 words Discussion on issues related to communication, fault tolerance, consistency etc. - 600 words Example applications of the computing paradigm - 400 words-Discussion on issues related to communication, fault tolerance, consistency etc. You need to choose two issues, such as communication and synchronisation. You need to then provide real world examples of how these issues are addressed/implemented. So for cloud computing paradigm you may have something like this (this is only a guide for those who are stuck): Communication in AWS (~125 words) Communication in Azure (~125 words) Synchronisation in AWS (~125 words) Synchronisation in Azure (~125 words)

posts.text: ICE 应用 所有ICE应用的第一步都是编写一个Slice定义， 其中包括应用所用的所有的各个接口 编写服务器并编译 编写客户并编译 R I (Remote method invocation) communicator adapter -> 适配器 创建代理： stringToProxy(服务器标识和服务器端口号) 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829import com.zeroc.Ice.Communicator;public class Server{ private Communicator communicator; public static void main(String[] args) { // 创建对象 Server server = new Server(); // 初始化communicator server.communicator = com.zeroc.Ice.Util.initialize(args); System.out.println("Server starting."); // 创建Adapter 并指定接口 com.zeroc.Ice.ObjectAdapter adapter = server.communicator.createObjectAdapterWithEndpoints("SimplePrinterAdapter", "default -p 10001"); // 初始化一个 PrinterI 的实例 叫做 object （定义于 Printer.java） com.zeroc.Ice.Object object = new PrinterI(); // 给object 一个身份 -》 SimplePrinter 并激活 - 开始在上面指定的接口监听 adapter.add(object, com.zeroc.Ice.Util.stringToIdentity("SimplePrinter")); adapter.activate(); System.out.println("Adapter activated. Waiting for data."); server.communicator.waitForShutdown(); System.out.println("Server ending"); }} 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627import com.zeroc.Ice.Communicator;import Demo.PrinterPrx;public class Client{ private PrinterPrx printerWorker; private Communicator communicator; public static void main(String[] args) { //初始化对象以及communicator Client client = new Client(); client.communicator = com.zeroc.Ice.Util.initialize(args); //创建代理 代理指向远程服务器的端口号 即指定的 adpator com.zeroc.Ice.ObjectPrx base = client.communicator.stringToProxy("SimplePrinter:default -p 10001"); //返回了一个 SimplePrinter 的代理 client.printerWorker = PrinterPrx.checkedCast(base); if(client.printerWorker == null) { throw new Error("Invalid proxy"); } //调用了服务器的方法 client.printerWorker.printString("Hello World!"); }} 123456789101112131415161718public void run() { Thread thread = new Thread() { @Override public void run() { while (bool == true) { SensorData data = getSensorData(); monitor.report(data); try { Thread.currentThread(); Thread.sleep(1000); } catch (InterruptedException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } } }; thread.start(); } 12345678910111213141516171819private void runMonitor() { String topicName = userName + "Sensors"; com.zeroc.Ice.ObjectPrx obj = communicator.stringToProxy("DemoIceStorm/TopicManager:tcp -p 1000"); com.zeroc.IceStorm.TopicManagerPrx topicManager = com.zeroc.IceStorm.TopicManagerPrx.checkedCast(obj); TopicPrx topic = null; while (topic == null) { try { topic = topicManager.retrieve(topicName); } catch (com.zeroc.IceStorm.NoSuchTopic ex) { try { topic = topicManager.create(topicName); } catch (com.zeroc.IceStorm.TopicExists ex1) { } } } com.zeroc.Ice.ObjectPrx pub = topic.getPublisher().ice_oneway(); monitor = MonitorIcePrx.uncheckedCast(pub);} ###JAVA 语法积累： throws (AllSensors.java -> main函数)2.-LinkedHashMap可以认为是HashMap+LinkedList，即它既使用HashMap操作数据结构，又使用LinkedList维护插入元素的先后顺序。-LinkedHashMap的基本实现思想就是—-多态。可以说，理解多态，再去理解LinkedHashMap原理会事半功倍；反之也是，对于LinkedHashMap原理的学习，也可以促进和加深对于多态的理解。 Publish/Subscribe in Ice IceStorm： 是 publish 和 subscribe 的中间层 IceStorm： 是单向通知消息 component/process： 用来显示从订阅主题（topic）接受消息的兴趣 topic： 类似与之前的Slice interface， 接口的一些操作->去定义了topic支持的数据类型 publisher 通过topic的代理（proxy）去发送消息，subscriber 继承topic的接口去接受消息 实现发布订阅者 先得到 ‘TopicManger’ 的一个主题 获取具体的，比如 ‘Weather’ 主题的一个代理，如果主题不存在，就创建这个主题，否走就获得已有主题的代理 获取主题的 ‘发布对象’ 代理， 这个代理用来发布消息，因此被窄化成主题接口 收集并报告监测数据 netstat -aon|findstr “8080”taskkill -PID 进程号 -F

posts.text: 如何理解什么是卷积（没有理解）https://www.zhihu.com/question/22298352两个函数的卷积，本质上是先将一个函数翻转，然后进行滑动叠加，在连续的情况下，叠加指的是对两个函数的乘积求积分，在离散的情况下就是加权求和 如何理解什么是池化 Convolution Operation多种卷积计算类型数学中的卷积与深度学习中的卷积有什么区别？Matlab中的CONV2（A,B）函数在计算时会对B矩 阵先进行180°的旋转 Pooling 池化实际上是一种形式的降采样，这种机制能够有效地原因在于，在发现一个特征之后，它的精确位置远不及它和其他特征的相对位置的关系重要。池化层会不断地减小数据的空间大小，因此参数的数量和计算量也会下降，这在一定程度上也控制了过拟合 特征不变形 特征降维 在一定程度上防止过拟合 根据图6.6 可以看出随着深度的增加，网络的精确度也随之升高 根据图6.7 层数更深的网络“红色”拥有更好的表现，同时参数的增加也需要更深层网络模型去容纳这些参数，因此“蓝色”这种浅层的网络随着参数增加精度不会升高。”绿色全连接网络”的表现相对稳定，精度没有随着网络参数的增多发生明显起伏

posts.title: 什么是欲望
posts.text: 最近又在想一个奇怪的问题，欲望是什么？ 1.引 “对欲望不理解，人就永远不能从桎梏和恐惧中解脱出来。如果你摧毁了你的欲望，可能你也摧毁了你的生活。如果你扭曲它，压制它，你摧毁的可能是非凡之美。” 2.【欲望】 新华词典： 基本解释：1.希望﹐盼望。 2.想得到某种东西或达到某种目的的要求。 Cambridge Dictionary： to want something, especially strongly 3.是什么？  词典的定义都是由表面现象得到定义，我想知道的是本质的欲望是什么呢？不管是什么样的思绪和想法，一旦清楚的明白它就可以掌控它，就像之前关于生命我的不解、时常涌出的烦闷都在那天看见那段话之后完全释然   “我无法接受这个可怜的生命仅仅在无边的宇宙中像一粒微尘一样存在过短短的一段时间然后永远消失不见的残酷事实。荣格说，这个问题不能常想，否则人会疯掉。我却常常想，不由自主，至今尚未疯掉只能说明我的神经质地坚韧，而且不是一般的坚韧。”明白自己的困扰从哪里来、自己的恐惧是因为什么、这种感受又该怎么表述，在这之后，我理解了它，也摆脱了这个问题对我的困扰。   而【欲望】是什么？我没有找到严谨的定义或者是对于人为什么会被其裹挟，仅仅是生物的本能嘛？不知道，只是随便写写这些乱七八糟的问题，留下一个思绪的线索，如果有一天得以明了，再来补上。 ———————- 11月27日晚 补充—————   今天晚上随手翻了翻书正好看到黑格尔在讲精神现象学的时候提到的一段话可以作为现阶段的理解或者是这个问题是不能理解的原因：   将绝对精神的一切内容都理解为了有限事物，理解为了人的绝对本质和人的表象，所以说绝对的本质对它来说变成了一种不可能具有任何规定和谓词的虚空简言之，之前因为李银河那段话而豁然的问题是具体的、可描述的现象，而对于欲望这种组成人的本质难以有一个具体描述或定义。
